ja512:10.1: Yaṃ pitva → yaṃ ve pītvā (bj) | yaṃ pītvā (pts1)
ja512:12.1: Yaṃ pitva → yaṃ ve pītvā (bj) | yaṃ pītvā (pts1)
ja512:14.1: Yaṃ pitva → yaṃ ve pītvā (bj) | yaṃ pītvā (pts1)
ja512:18.3: Ucchedanī vittavataṃ → ucchedanī vittagataṃ (s2, s3) | ucchedanivittagataṃ (mr)
ja512:21.1: Yaṃ ve pivitvāna → yaṃ ve pitvāna (s2, s3) | yañce pītvāna (pts1)
ja512:28.2: ghoravisamiva → ... visammiva (bj, pts1) | ... visaṃ iva (mr) | ... visāmiva (?)
